node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Raylite Optical Singapore in Raylite Optical. Image may contain: sunglasses

node.text: Fav childhood memory w mom will be.. me trying v hard to be short-sighted by sticking my eyes vvv close to the tv, in hopes that I can wear spectacles (thought it was cool then). Hoho mom found out and kept it a secret so dad wouldn’t yell at me. My mom, my partner in crime! 🤪 @fanngyii @hannahyaaaah @hlhblizz
- Giveaway closed! ❤️ We will announce our lucky winner on Stories on 8 May at 8pm -

[Mother’s Day Giveaway💕] Share your favourite childhood memory with Mom and stand a chance to win a pair of designer sunglasses for her! 🕶
⠀⠀
One lucky winner will receive:
- A pair of Guess Sunglasses (Worth $230)
- $10 Raylite Gift Voucher
⠀⠀
To participate:
1️⃣ Follow us @rayliteoptical on IG or Facebook
2️⃣ Share a favourite childhood memory with your mom in the comment section
3️⃣ Tag 3 friends to spread the love
⠀⠀
⭐️ Bonus chance if you repost this giveaway on Stories and tag us @rayliteoptical! (*Set account to public)
⠀⠀
Closing date: 7 May 2020, 2359
⠀⠀
The winner will be chosen and announced on 8 May 2020. Only open to residents in Singapore and prize will be delivered directly to the winner.
⠀⠀
T&C: Raylite Optical reserves the right to make the final decision. All valid entries from both Facebook and Instagram will be reviewed. Only one winner will be selected. Good luck to all 😊 ⠀⠀
#rayliteoptical
#giveawaysg
#giveawaysingapore
#stayhomesg
#circuitbreakersg
#mothersday2020

My favourite childhood memory with my mum was our weekly wet market trip. She would buy her groceries from the usual stores & I would get to choose my favourite fruits & snacks to buy back home to eat. At the end of these trips, we would always stop by McDonald for their breakfast set & vanilla ice cream cone ❤️ @eelynnac @mythicalfantasia @hxdlxy_
Going to the market with her on weekend mornings. Have to wake up at 7am but I love spending time with her!  @hues_of_lif3 @ghuiiyiing @blingnsplitz

My all time favourite mum has given me lots of wonderful memories. 
The one which is unforgettable is she will always patiently guided me as during my younger days i am a slow learner so he teach and play with me slowly without complaining. 
She will look after me no matter how busy she is and given lots of care & support. 
There was once during my younger days i almost die at train station and staff quickly call my dad. My mum quickly rush from home to the location giving me support to recuse me from death. She will always help those who in need of help no matter how busy she is.
A great and kind lady who always treat everybody sincerely. My blessing to have a SuperMom with me as without her i wont be here today. My supermom superhero always special to me.
Love her my best mum. Thank you so much for everything u done for me. My bessing to have amazing mum like her. ❤❤❤❤
Special
Unconditional Love
Patient
Easygoing
Reliable
Magnanimous
Observant
Make dreams com true
❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤
Hope to win for her
Liked and shared to all
Fb Carol Neo
@hlgoh.sg @layhoontoh @nel.lamtc

Happy mother's day to all amazing mummies 💐
 My mom is the best, remarkable single rised up me and 2 sister's by taking up few jobs to supported us, a seamstress at home, hand washed clothing, cooking meals at  neighbourhood house, evening work zi char stall washing dishes, we would tagged along followed my mom to help out.  In order to save on transportation she would cycle my younger sister to school everyday.  She had suffered alot for us had her knee replacement last year july, and right elbow replacement during last year still occasionally pain when weather changed.  My mom is thrifty with herself, don't asked for anything. Thank you for unconditional love for us. She even helped us our confinement cooking and take care of our 6 little ones. Thank you for your selflessness and unconditional love for us. 💖💖💖 @jchin10 @hlgoh.sg  @gracegisellepng

My fondest memories is my a nanny of 2 of my relatives children's and when is pay day, she bring me to buy me out and buy me my biscuits for me and my siblings. 
Dear mom 👸
You are my strength and guidance me along the path, and love, compassionate and bravery you teach me.
Thank you and always grateful, mum. ❤
Hope to win for her, as Mother's day fall on her birthday, double happiness to suprise her. 🎂🎉 @layhoontoh @imhelenbain @hlgoh.sg

My most precious childhood memory of my mum and forever grave in my heart is I'm very thankful to my mum for single-handedly raised the 2 of us by doing two jobs, do housework till past midnight & teaches us good morales. I know it been tough on her to act dual roles as a Mother & a Father. She is the pillar of strength and source of income for the whole family. She never once complained and stayed strong throughout because she just want to give us the best she could & seeing us grow up healthy & happily. 💓 Despite we were not rich, but I was never once felt lack. My mum will save every single bit of goodness to us and provides us with everything as much as she can.
Now that she's old, we all are grown up and have stable job, I want to show her appreciation and gratitude every day possible. Without her unconditional love and care, we wouldn’t be who we are today!! She is also my Best Friend who listen to my problem & share my worries & happiness. Grateful for her everything. 🥰
Thank you for the thoughtful giveaway! ❤️
Hope to win this because she is frugal and doesn’t want me to splurge on her. This is my best chance to pamper her.
She will definitely be thrilled & delighted. Seeing her smiles of joy is my happiest moment!! 😄
Fb: zoey belle chua @meiqinkb @rahrahkoh @shalomzozo
Fav childhood memory is making clothes for my Barbie together with my mum! We’ll flip through magazines for ideas and my mum will sew the clothes for me ❤️ @wat3rmelonjoys @roquefort_baby @jenxelaw

favorite memories were the childhood days where my mum brought me along to the hawker for breakfast after sending my elder sister to kindergarten. Mum will order my favourite Lor Mee to share instead of her favourite prawn noodles and share a tall glass of iced soya bean milk before bringing me along to the wet market for groceries. 
@jenxelaw @carrebearrrr  @cforcassandra

Memorable and favourite childhood moments with my Mum, these are plenty! Among which are the times when I was a little kid, my Mum would make simple sandwiches for me for breakfast, as an afternoon snack or for supper. The fillings usually consisted of boiled eggs, sliced tomatoes, tuna and definitely an enormous serving of my Mum's love! ❤️ I also remembered my Mum teaching me how to use the pop-up bread toaster and I simply enjoyed pressing down the lever on the side to activate it. And I would also eagerly wait for the popping sound when the latch was released so that I could "catch" the bread slice popping up from the slot. It was pure joy for a simple kid like me. And my action unfailingly also brought a broad smile on my Mum's face. Thinking back, our sweet moments together made my bread tastier and the feeling of my Mum's love for me a shade warmer! 😊

Let me also share my utmost pride for my MA-rvellous Mum via this self-penned ode to her:

Your love, I don't have to queue
Your concern, always right on cue
Your patience unfailingly clears my issue
Your knowledge infallibly is my rescue
Your strength, a lifetime goal I pursue
You've turned my life into the sweetest fondue! ❤️ ❤️ ❤️ I love you, Mum. And I wanna make you smile every day! ❤️ ❤️ ❤️ Team @rayliteoptical, please pamper my Mum queenly this Mother's Day with your divine gift that's as splendid as her selfless love for her son! 😀

Yes, all Mums in the world deserve the best! 😘 @estherkamst @fuqizhuang @christinavirneige

Favourite childhood memory with my mom was when she brought me and my brother to Swimming lessons weekly. She would sit through and wait for our lessons to end. She would also always make hot Milo for us to warm us up! 😍 @wat3rmelonjoys @eunicechenwy @_peiix2

Favourite childhood memory with my mom was when she brought me and my brother to Swimming lessons weekly. She would sit through and wait for our lessons to end. She would also always make hot Milo for us to warm us up! 😍 @lewwisss @picohon @berlinbuckets

My favourite memory was when she drove me to school / back home. It doesn’t happen very often and that’s why it’s something to be cherished. We usually turn on the radio and listen to the funny stories DJs are telling. I like those moments because we can laugh and talk and discuss issues that we would not have if we were to be in other settings. Seems like the car is just a comfort place for both of us 🙌🙌🙌 @rouqiii @rourowroe @lordnelsonng

My favourite memory was when she drove me to school / back home. It doesn’t happen very often and that’s why it’s something to be cherished. We usually turn on the radio and listen to the funny stories DJs are telling. I like those moments because we can laugh and talk and discuss issues that we would not have if we were to be in other settings. Seems like the car is just a comfort place for both of us 🙌🙌🙌 @teosawwoon @yixiangn @hollymolly56

My favourite memory with my mum is the time where she joins me in a school event. We have to compete and participate in different activities together to win some points and prizes. There’s much fun creating artwork together and also balloons popping game . We didn’t get the first prize but it was a fond memory :) @weeqiweeqi @undefinedrxses @choon_leng

My favourite memory was when she made peanut butter bread for me when it was my first day of primary school. I remember not knowing what to expect, but she woke up early, prepared my lunchbox and sent me off to school, which made me calm my nerves to have someone looking after me 🥰🥰🥰 @rouqiii @rourowroe @teosawwoon

My favourite memory was when she made peanut butter bread for me when it was my first day of primary school. I remember not knowing what to expect, but she woke up early, prepared my lunchbox and sent me off to school, which made me calm my nerves to have someone looking after me 🥰🥰🥰 @lordnelsonng @yixiangn @yinlin56

My favourite childhood memory with mum is first time only mom and daughter together to Terengganu, Malaysia vacation. Watching how the the sea turtle laying egg on the beach. This is awesome experience (^. ^)
@85hy @joeychew77 @layhoontoh

When I was very young . My parent work in the hawker ctr . I remember we do not have week end family outing as week end was my parent most busy time with their work . We dun come from very rich family . And I remember during my primary 1 school life onward . After school I will rush to help my parent In the stall. My mum scare I will be bored there she actually sew ( 5 stone ) for me to play to surprise me . Will help out and wait till my mum finish her work and we walk home together . Life is simple but it really give me a good memories and make me treasure every moment with my dear mum . ❤️❤️ @xiaoling_wif5kiddos  @soniakathlynn  @ahsinoriahk

Fav childhood memory w mom will be.. me trying v hard to be short-sighted by sticking my eyes vvv close to the tv, in hopes that I can wear spectacles (thought it was cool then). Hoho mom found out and kept it a secret so dad wouldn’t yell at me. My mom, my partner in crime! 🤪 @fanngyii @hannahyaaaah @hlhblizz
